label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_012
content:
## 2026-01-14 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS 22300 req | p50: 19.6ms p95: 48.8ms p99: N/A | err: 0.1% (27 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /ttl-change: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /health-check: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 39% | Mem 65% | Disk 75% | Conns: 1338 | Net: 92/130 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 29% | Mem 53% | Disk 56% | Conns: 1116 | Net: 71/90 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 59% | Mem 73% | Disk 51% | Conns: N/A | Net: 115/154 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 46% | Mem 78% | Disk 61% | Conns: N/A | Net: 19/24 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-name: active N | idle N | waiting N | exhaustion: N | max: N | avg_wait: Xms
- transfer-pool: active 4 | idle 2 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 10 | avg_wait 12ms
- dnssec-sign: active 1 | idle 2 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 5 | avg_wait 8ms
- cache-refresh: active 3 | idle 4 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 1 | max 8 | avg_wait 15ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 87.1% | Bandwidth: 2.3 Gbps | Origin requests: 1500

### Alerts
- [WARNING] TSIG failure on cloud-dns-sync-01: 1 failure
- [CRITICAL] Propagation latency high on edge site: 205s p95
- [INFO] DNSSEC bogus validation events: 3
- [ERROR] SOA serial mismatch in zones: 2
- [WARNING] Lame delegation detected: 0

### Deployments & Changes
- Applied delayed batch for cloud sync controller post-maintenance; observed temporary p95 increase; verified eventual consistency.
- Enforced change policy: disabled console edits for production zones after zone mismatch detection.
- Corrected NS target formatting and removed duplicate TXT segments after lint issues in partner subzones.
- Created dashboard for transfer latency and TSIG failures; set alerts for p95 > 1800ms and failures > 2/hour.

### Events
- Cloud sync controller applied delayed batch after maintenance window; observed temporary propagation p95 increase; verified eventual consistency across edges.
- Two zones showed SOA serial mismatch after concurrent edits in git and manual console change; enforced change policy: console edits disabled for production projects.
- Lint detected 6 issues after importing partner-managed subzones; corrected NS target formatting and removed duplicate TXT segments.
- Created new dashboard for transfer latency and TSIG failures; set alerts on p95 > 1800ms and failures > 2 per hour.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: C. Martinez. 2 pages. 7 tickets. Status: Stable; addressed process gap around console edits and improved observability.
